nodes.text: The Imperial Heavy Repulsortank was a model of heavy repulsortank employed by the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. It was armed with a single turret-mounted heavy laser cannon, a grenade launcher, and two light repeating blasters. One of the repulsortanks was deployed on the planet Edan II, where it guarded a convoy of repulsorlift transports and Imperial patrol landspeeders that was attacked by Alliance to Restore the Republic operatives in conjunction with local outlaws commanded by Scruts.
